content.raw:
Could you also do something similar for line 73 and 101 (in your new file). I think it really makes sense that it's all displayed in the `OutputBox` (we could possibly consider ditching the label entirely). 

The only reason I had the label was because the `OutputBox` code was not very good at the time and so making things format nicely was difficult. I just used a label for speed and simplicity. Since then the `OutputBox` code has become a lot better (thanks to @cbillington) and is now wrapped nicely so these problems don't exist.
content.html:
Could you also do something similar for line 73 and 101 (in your new file). I think it really makes sense that it's all displayed in the OutputBox (we could possibly consider ditching the label entirely).

The only reason I had the label was because the OutputBox code was not very good at the time and so making things format nicely was difficult. I just used a label for speed and simplicity. Since then the OutputBox code has become a lot better (thanks to @cbillington) and is now wrapped nicely so these problems don't exist.
